content.rendered:
In today’s sad-things-I-read-on-Sunday we’d like to bring you the sad tale of a robin who had to abandon her nest.

A couple of weeks ago I fixed a broken window in our shed. After doing so we noticed a robin in the shed. It didn’t seem to want to come out. We left the door open hoping it would fly out eventually.  I guess we eventually shut the door not knowing the fate of the robin.

Well, today I was doing some tidying and found a plastic box with… well…  with a load of random organic stuff in it.

Closer inspection revealed the sad nature of the random organic stuff.

I feel bad.  Sorry robin. ?

excerpt.rendered: In today’s sad-things-I-read-on-Sunday we’d like to bring you the sad tale of a robin who had to abandon her nest.
